%# Database File : Ana-DiafL-ParSyn-PrPrf2-1\qt_endl%@ Database source: G_Epal\qt_endlΈχουμε\qt_endl\[ f(x+h)-f(x)=(x+h)^2-x^2=x^2+2xh+h^2-x^2=2xh+h^2=h(2x+h) \]\qt_endlΓια κάθε $ h\neq 0 $ ισχύει\qt_endl\[ \frac{f(x+h)-f(x)}{h}=\frac{h(2x+h)}{h}=2x+h \]\qt_endlάρα\qt_endl\[ \lim_{h\to 0}\frac{f(x+h)-f(x)}{h}=\lim_{h\to 0}(2x+h)=2x \]\qt_endlΕπομένως $ (x^2)'=2x $.\qt_endl%# End of file Ana-DiafL-ParSyn-PrPrf2-1
